name: Prana Nemma Sweater - Women's
description:
When sweater weather arrives, soft and cozy are a the right formula. The Nemma adds texture and does it in a gentle blend of organic fibres and long-wearing synthetics.Organic cotton blend is light, soft and warm.Garter knit pattern keep things interesting.Mock-neck keeps warm in and chilly out.Standard fit feels just right from day one.

        Sustainability
